entities.name: muggles
entities.description: The text refers to 'Muggles' as a group of people who are not wizards or witches. The term is used in the context of ruling and being ruled.

entities.name: power
entities.description: The power given to wizards and witches is described as a right to rule, but also comes with responsibilities.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Albus Dumbledore is mentioned in the text as having once dreamed of overthrowing the Statute of Secrecy and establishing Wizard rule over Muggles.

relationships.description: The power given to wizards and witches gives them the right to rule over Muggles.
Albus Dumbledore once dreamed of overthrowing the Statute of Secrecy.
